message:
‎"SEE what's going on and where THROUGH YOUR FRIENDS EYES" - that's what WHOS.IN is all about! 

Take the chance to test the ease and beauty of using quick photo snapshots to check-in. Use WHOS.IN in everyday situations and give us your feedback!

Testing is simple, as we use testFlight to install betas "over the air".  Just go to http://whos.in/, click on "early access" and register your iPhone.
